Package com.googlecode.cqengine.query.option

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArgumentValidationOption  
    AttributeOrder<O>
    Represents an attribute and an associated preference for sorting results according to that attribute in ascending or descending order.
    DeduplicationOption  
    FlagsDisabled
    A wrapper around object keys ("flags") which are said to be disabled.
    FlagsEnabled
    A wrapper around object keys ("flags") which are said to be enabled.
    IsolationOption  
    OrderByOption<O>
    Represents a list of attributes and associated preferences for sorting results according to those attributes each in ascending or descending order.
    QueryLog
    If set as a query option causes CQEngine to log its internal decisions during query evaluation to the given sink.
    QueryOptions
    Encapsulates a map of optional key-value parameters supplied by the application to the query engine, attributes and indexes.
    Threshold
    A wrapper around a key and an associated Double value, representing the value for that threshold key which is to be applied to tune CQEngine query performance.
    Thresholds
    A wrapper around Thresholds which have been set into query options.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ArgumentValidationStrategy
    Allows the app to disable argument validation in CQEngine via a QueryOption, to improve performance.
    DeduplicationStrategy  
    EngineFlags
    An enum of some flags which can be set into QueryOptions to request certain behaviours from the query engine.
    EngineThresholds
    An enum whose members can be used to set query options with Double values, representing thresholds which can be overridden to tune CQEngine query performance.
    IsolationLevel
